website_summaries.verdict: Small and flexible, a great whiteboard to keep track of complicated schedules.
pros: This whiteboard stands out for its super-strong magnetic backing
Can be mounted on the fridge for easy, central viewability
The sheeting flexes to fit over curved refrigerator doors when necessary
cons: Magnets are so strong that it may be difficult to remove the whiteboard when necessary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these planners to create chore charts for my kiddos. They arrived well-packaged and as described. The planners flattened out nicely on my refrigerator and the few air bubbles beneath smoothed out easily. The kids love them and are actually doing their chores, so I am VERY pleased! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JeanieLewis

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn’t great...
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, as soon as I got it out of the box and put it on the fridge, it’s already starting to bubble/peel off the magnetic back. Why did they send this rolled up in a tube? Had it been sent flat in a large envelope it likely wouldn’t have started to fall apart so soon. I’ll use it for now because it’s needed, but I am disappointed in the quality of the item. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We use two of these calendars to keep track of kids activities and work schedules and the like. Week 1 goes on one and Week 2 on the other; then when Week 1 is over, it becomes Week 3 (if that makes sense). The calendars have nice big boxes with room to write a number of things for each of us and still be easy to read. Good magnetic sticking power. The markers are sub-par, but we have a decent supply of markers already, so that wasn't a big deal. Overall, very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and eraser is good
customer_reviews.text: I got this board for my elderly parents so care giver can write notes, doctor's appts etc on there for them. So far it's been effecient and is and added help with helping them with reminders. Good quality and eraser is good. I would suggest having another marker/eraser handy as they tend to dry after a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: JaNeen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but can't wipe off the markers...
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great board, worked well on the fridge and the markers it came with seemed to wipe off fine at first. Then things got busy, and it's been over a month (maybe two) since I erased and rewrote it, and now I can't get the marker off. I've tried a wet cloth, windex, and of course erasers on the back of the pens...I can't find the cloth it came with, but I'll look for something like that. Any recommendations on how to get the marker off after a month (or two)? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place for easy writing.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it is organized and how tightly it stays on the refrigerator! No sliding around at all. The only problem I see is that the markers are not equally strong in color(some are clearer than others) , and it would be nice if they were sharper pointed. However, for the price, this is a great product so far. After all, it is the magnetic calendar that I paid for, not the markers, and I can always use other markers.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: That’s is planner is excellent! The magnet is great and strong, and the layout is almost exactly what I was looking for. However, the markers that came with it started dying after the first use (yes they each were capped properly and it was all four markers), but I didn’t buy this for the markers so I still enjoy the product. If the layout and size were what you wanted, this is the product to buy. I was going to give it 4 stars, but then I thought about it, and if it had not come with the markers that died quickly, I would have rated it 5 stars. And since I didn’t buy it for the markers, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping track of chores
customer_reviews.text: I like this for keeping track of chores. The only problem I had with this product is the when it arrived there were a few spots where the edges were bent. It seems to have mostly flattened out but perhaps the packaging could be a little better to protect it. I did not try to send it back because the defects were fairly small BUT it was not perfect. So only 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality & customizable.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to plan our week! Honestly great quality, even the markers are awesome... and for the price you can’t beat it! I love that it’s completely blank so I could even use it for meal prepping! The sections are a great size. Sticks to fridge with a magnet back so it 1. Stays completely adhered to fridge and 2. Wont damage your fridge. So glad I went with this one over others.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic weekly planner for refrigerator was exactly what I wanted and needed. Easy to use. Works as advertised. The proof in the pudding is that I use it faithfully since I started and use it every day to help with memory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Best don't forget  anything planner
customer_reviews.text: We love our planner, this is the best way not to forget anything. The four pens allow us to do the difference between work, leisure and shopping, and physio for example or one color per person. I recommend it. It has the right size.
customer_reviews.author: HMV

customer_reviews.title: Switched to wet-erase (overhead transparency) markers to prevent the dry-erase from getting smudged or wiped off - they work great now!
customer_reviews.text: Use this on our fridge for weekly planning - everyone in the house loves it and uses it daily. Switched to wet-erase (overhead transparency) markers to prevent the dry-erase from getting smudged or wiped off - they work great now!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McLean

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I like that the whole thing is magnetic so it lays completely flat. The sections make it easy to put organized to do list. I haven't had it long enough to truly speak to durability
customer_reviews.author: Abi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves to plan out her day but still manages to miss her appointments. She is a wife, a mom of two kids and one dog child. She absolutely loves this and has yet to miss any appointments since its on the fridge for everyone to see.
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia

customer_reviews.title: Great weekly calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a weekly calendar to remind us of our appointments and what better way than having one on the fridge. It’s the perfect size, sticks well to the fridge and has plenty of space to write appointments plus any little notes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It has a bubble in the notes area and one of the corners will not lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: RN Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this set for my fridge. I am not able to magnet them to my fridge, but use a double side tape to stick to it. Nice looking and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ksunina

customer_reviews.title: Large Blocks, Easy-to --read, Color Coordinated Pens
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Great size for a refrigerator. At a glance, I can see important appointments for the week ahead. Color pens allow priorities and family members to see what's ahead. Vendor provided excellent customer service. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BrenzEver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We keep this on the side of our fridge; really helps keep our weekly activities and appointments straight! Some of the marker colors are harder to get fully erased than others.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ketterman

customer_reviews.title: Nice layout but ghosts easily.
customer_reviews.text: I like the layout and markers with magnets. However if you leave something on the calendar for the whole week it's hard to get off and there is a lot of ghosting.
customer_reviews.author: SC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We are retired senior citizens and use a white board on the fridge to keep track of each week so we don't forget any appointment or other important things. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great on the Fridge
customer_reviews.text: We can stay organize now. Being a complete magnet it does not fall off like the prior one I had which just had a few magnetic strips. I recommend this one. The markers stick well to it and it wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for the amount that I paid and exceeds my expectations. It fits nicely one side of my fridge. It came with 4 markers that conveniently have a magnet built into the cap. There’s also a cloth to wipe the board with which I’ve stuck behind a corner of the board. I’m sure I’ll get to use this for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Layout is good, but quality isn't all there
customer_reviews.text: The markers aren't that great compared to other dry erase ones I've used. The writable area itself doesn't clean easily - you'll need to wet it most of the time. Mine also has a couple bubbles between the magnetic layer and the top layer. OK product for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Comes rolled up but flattens nicely! It got a little wet and it caused the power to wrinkle but it’s better then I thought after it dried.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Better off keeping the old
customer_reviews.text: The pre stamped sections are very light colored. Almost can’t see to sections. The one I was trying to replace has much bolder writing so I like that one better.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Helped me figure out how to get organized.. but not a perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The markers didn’t work, which was fine I just got different markers. It was going welll for a while then it started to stain and then it started to peel..
customer_reviews.author: DebDeb

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner for my mother who is older and forgetful. It helps to see upcoming doctor appointments or reminders for medication. I use the notes to highlight important items for the following week. She loves it. I found it so useful I bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaH

customer_reviews.title: Best weekly calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the frig, my mom lives with us and now she can walk to the kitchen and see where everyone is on any day! Solves all my problems. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Muscat

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! It makes the week schedule much more visible since you can write more on each day than a full calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job Well
customer_reviews.text: I like the weekly planner well enough. It does the job I need it too. Every Sunday evening I lay out the week ahead as a quick reference for all in the house. From Days off to scout meetings to reminders that a big test is coming up. my family utlizies it well.
customer_reviews.author: Crazi Momma Reads

customer_reviews.title: Good little tool
customer_reviews.text: Great little organization tool, it looks great and I really have seen a difference in keeping up with chores, and keeping track of groceries 😝. Gave it 4/5 durability because it is starting to stain from the markers as it's a dry erase coating on a magnet instead of an actual board, but I knew that when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven and Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good for small organization needs.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great tool to keep organized. My one issue is hay the first time I wrote on it and used the eraser provided, it didn’t wipe clean. There was some residue smear left over. It suits my needs, though.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for displaying weekly menu
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my refrigerator to display the weekly menu and grocery items needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Sticks to the fridge perfectly, good size and the markers are great. I love that they have magnets and erasers. It also comes with a cloth to wipe the entire board clean. Perfect for weekly chores, meal planning and reminders.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. We needed a weekly calendar for our refrigerator and this one fits perfectly. The magnet is strong so the calendar doesn't slip or slide down. The markers are magnetized, too and stay up. The green marker has been harder to erase, but other than that it works great. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: leslie wolf

customer_reviews.title: Okay Planner
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a few months and after awhile the markers became more difficult to wash off. We could use water and paper towel but had to scrub to clean the planner.
customer_reviews.author: Delaina Kinnison

customer_reviews.text: So far it has been doing good although I wish the magnets were a different color as I can't ever put the black marker back on the fridge because the magnet is the same color black.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Sticks to fridge without rolling up on the sides, also erases without leaving marks!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sticks well but arrived late.
customer_reviews.text: Product was what I excepted! Came with 4 markers (which write well) and a cloth. Eveything is magnetic and sticks to the fridge nicely. However, product didn't come 2 days shipping with prime. I ordered it on Tuesday and was expected to arrive Friday, but t came Sunday. But with that said it was 4th of July week so I gave them the benefit of the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough and detailed enough at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to use easily and daily and detailed enough to keep all your info, lists, and appointments organized-I’m not usually good with keeping calendar’s up to date but this one is so convenient, I use it weekly!!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: We love this calendar. With a newborn baby in the house, we need to know at all times who will be home when to take care of the baby. The calendar is incredibly useful for making sure our schedules are in synch. We also use it to keep a record of the baby’s last diaper change and feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had large bubbles under the surface between the white writing surface and the magnetic back. Returned and re-ordered a second one and it, too, has very large bubbles under the surface making it an uneven surface to write on and aesthetically, it doesn't look very nice. Very disappointed in the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. Helps me keep organized and now there is no mystery about whats for dinner. I can leave notes for the kids, and keep a schedule. Fits perfect my apartment fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Mskamille

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the fridge. Markers don’t erase well if you leave the writing for a while, but a wet paper towel takes it right off.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I wish I could return this product, but it's past the return date. I used this only once and the marker will NOT erase from my board. I will probably end up throwing it away because I can't even erase my own writing so this item was like a one-time use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sun

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a magnetic white board for the refrigerator door to plan out our weekly food menus. This is perfect for our purpose. Came rolled up in a box. Immediately flattened out on the frig. Pens are great.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Needed for every family!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to keep the whole family in the loop for each week!
customer_reviews.author: lilverp

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love it got it for my kids chores . worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Monst

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was looking for something for her college fridge- and this was perfect! it does the job and the price was great. Quickly arrived- all intact.
customer_reviews.author: ARB

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward, Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this calendar. The thin design makes it super sleek and easy to move around the fridge. My only dislike is the markers are very small and do not fit well in my manly hands!! :) However, my Girlfriend loves it and uses it often. Mainly to leave me notes about how incredible I am and how much she loves me. I guess when you got it, you got it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Defective with bubble upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: Top issues with so many of the fridge planners are air bubbles and eraseabilty over time. Since this one had a higher rating I was hoping to get a good one, but unfortunately like all the other 3 star reviews, mine had an almost 1 square inch separation starting along the edge out of the box. So I never used it and returned right away knowing the problem would only worsen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E Dobbe

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it...
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Even Expo dry erase markers stain the board after 3 days. Not very useful if you can't use the weekly board for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dena R Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the size!!! Large boxes for each day. Super easy to get it all together on the fridge. Great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bubbles in the middle of the board with rolling up corners .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to return though
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to return since it had bubbles in the material making it so you couldn't write on it. Easy to return though!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Good for price I paid! The magnets on markers aren’t the most powerful and the do slide around which isn’t ideal with lots of little hands around.
customer_reviews.author: nikki sperger

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to write out meals for the week and any appointments the family has. Markers work great and wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfaSon

customer_reviews.title: Eraseboard
customer_reviews.text: Good board. Pens suck. You have to scrub the pen off. It does not come off all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This perfectly fit my needs. I have a vertically split fridge and this fit perfectly on both sides, and even had a little room to spare. Erases easily and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gill Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great size for the front of our frig.
customer_reviews.text: Love this planner especially now with the new school year starting. We still had room for pictures and notes even after hanging the planner. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a busy family!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! No problems with packaging or upon opening. It erases easily, comes with different markers, and an eraser. I love it! It makes organizing my family easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jkaz

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Great magnetic power. Stuck right on the fridge, from the package. Love it! Only (small) complaint is that it has a quarter-size bubble in the bottom right.
customer_reviews.author: Carly S.

customer_reviews.title: Air bubbles on the planner
customer_reviews.text: The planner is great but mine arrived with air bubbles, making it hard to use. Waiting to hear from the seller to see if I can get a new one. Will update my review depending on their response.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Entire board is a magnet
customer_reviews.text: Product conveniently adheres well to the refrigerator. My son likes and uses it to track his chores. Markers that come with it are not good quality and magnets are weak, but expected as much. Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It really is a smart planner
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on my refrigerator. The markers erase easily. Really like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marva S Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Good magnetic board
customer_reviews.text: Very good magnetic board for the fridge, markers work great.
customer_reviews.author: _Lily_

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep track of our daughter’s very busy schedule. It’s just the right size and there is plenty of room to include everything.
customer_reviews.author: terry elston

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The magnet is strong and the planner lays nice and flag on the fridge so it looks great. The markers also have a strong magnet. I use this planner daily to keep my husband and I on track and it has been very helpful! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paula alves

customer_reviews.title: Nice for fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice on double four fridge. No problem with fitting text in boxes. Nice magnetic board.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J

customer_reviews.title: Double check the print!
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic! The print is not in line with the borders, it was peeling from right hand corner. It looks so cheap! Returning this the moment I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ9848

customer_reviews.title: ... come close to sticking on my stainless steel fridge like other reviews said it would
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t even come close to sticking on my stainless steel fridge like other reviews said it would
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, as described, just wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, was hoping for it to be a bit bigger, but it DID match the dimensions provided. Love the markers it came with, the erasers on them are better than the lint free cloth provided as an extra eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Uhh

customer_reviews.title: This does not stick to Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I order this because the reviews stated it would stick to stainless steel. It does not stick to a stainless steel refrigerator. I will be sending this back :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size, well layed out with enough room to write.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lays flat on fridge even after shipping. wipes clean. comes with markers (not very strong magnets though).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect organizer for my fridge! It fits my big handwriting, I can write down what’s going on for the day and what we’re having for dinner plus extra notes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Fits perfectly on my side by side ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Fits perfectly on my side by side refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: SFM

customer_reviews.title: Fit's great on my French Door refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to my husband and I can keep track of what is on each of our schedules...hope it works LOL!
customer_reviews.author: bluesurly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little planner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little planner. Adheres (magnetically) firmly on the door of our 'fridge with enough space that our hectic week is organized nicely. As a family of six our schedule is fluid and changing so the magnet pens are a plus -can keep them right there on the door next to the Planner.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent utility
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizing for the fridge, and the set of highlighters add a nice touch, to make your lists/set reminders quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Osman

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic weekly calendar helps my family stay organized! It is a great value for both the calendar and dry erase markers which easily erase unlike the previous calendar I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It
customer_reviews.text: It’s was pretty good. Nothing stellar but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like a lot
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. It's really good and helps with the communication at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is very helpful to remind something what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: It's handy to have a planner of this size, making it easier to "read and heed"!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with the magnetic white board and four colored markers!!! I have a problem with keeping a rigid schedule, so I'm hoping that this white board planner will help keep me on track.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Perfect size and love that it came with pens included. Only reason it’s not a 5 star is because it has a few bubbles between the actual board and the magnet backing. But not bad enough to return. 4.5 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pardo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moms and dads
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Busy schedules and organization starts with this in your fridge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: This Weekly Whiteboard was exactly what I was looking for for quick notes/reminders! Easily unboxed and slapped it on my fridge along with the 4 colored magnet markers! ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Rodites

customer_reviews.title: Unevenly Cut and looks Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Unevenly cut on LITERALLY every side. Laughably unprofessional. Not even worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I put it on my fridge. Love that the markers also stay on fridge because they are magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Marker magnets don't hold at all. Calendar definitely keeps me organized!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy G.

customer_reviews.title: It’s just a blank magnet
customer_reviews.text: Just comes blank, thought it would have areas for to do lists or days of the week, but it is just a plank magnet white board. Also the markers don’t erase well and leave streaks
customer_reviews.author: Chris Richey

customer_reviews.title: I like the organization it provides
customer_reviews.text: I like the organization it provides, but it came with air bubbles in it. Also after the second week of use it was harder to erase with just the little erasers on the end of the markers. I had to use a wet paper towel to get it clean
customer_reviews.author: Miano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses, the marker doesn't erase off completely well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to plan meals and cooks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I've had this planner for 2 weeks now and I love it! I love having a visual of my week! This product is a good price and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in good condition. Product as described and serving its intended purpose. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep up with busy schedules
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my fridge. Erases easily. Markers work great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricica M Waldbart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Not too big not too little to write and doesn't curl.
customer_reviews.author: PP

product_meta.title: Smart organizer & Weekly Planner White Board Organizer for your Refrigerator or Office 15" x 11.75" Inches ● with 4 Magnetic Color Dry Erase Markers! & Cloth Eraser
product_meta.description:
Color:White

Magnetic Fridge Dry Erase Planner For Getting Organized:

Our magnetic Planner, monthly planner, weekly planner, schedule board is made to fit on ANY kitchen refrigerator, thanks to its sturdy magnet.

There is ample surface to allow you and your family to efforlessly write, erase, rewrite and exchange ideas, notes & messages.

Ideal for tracking meals, appointments, sporting events, work deadlines or even school programs, this multi-purpose magnetic dry erase board with four dry erase markers helps ensure you're never behind.

Reusable & Durable:
